@title:Section for additional personal PvE rolls on weapons reviewed on DMB

@title:Season 15 Reissued Trials of the Nine weapons from Podcast 233
@notes:Weapons roundup as at S15 Festival of the Lost - additional personal rolls

// Judgment (PvE first choice roll)
// (Fastdraw HCS, SteadyHand HCS, TrueSight HCS, Hitmark HCS), (Tactical Mag, Flared Magwell, Appended Mag), Ensemble, (Timed Payload, MultiKill Clip)
//notes:Adamsdown_Boy PvE first choice roll. Recommended MW: Reload or Stability.

// Glacioclasm (PvE first choice roll)
// (Fluted Barrel, Arrowhead Brake, Chambered Compensator), Accelerated Coils, (Subsistence, Slideshot), Reservoir Burst
//notes:Adamsdown_Boy first choice PvE roll - reduce the charge time thorough Accelerated Coils and a Charge Time masterwork (the reduction in damage makes little difference to killing adds to proc Reservoir Burst and Subsistence). Recommended MW: Charge Time with damage-boosting mod.

// (Elastic String, Flexible String, Polymer String), (Fiberglass Arrow Shaft, Straight Fletching, Helical Fletching), (Archer's Tempo, Archer's Tempo Enhanced), (Explosive Head, Explosive Head Enhanced)
//notes:Adamsdown_Boy first choice PvE roll for end-game PvE content.
